content.rendered:
Smart hard-working students + top-notch instructors = a lot of learning in just 6 weeks.

Big thank you to Ricky Leung and Katherine Guzman for the photos!

excerpt.rendered: Smart hard-working students + top-notch instructors = a lot of learning in just 6 weeks. Big thank you to Ricky Leung and Katherine Guzman for the photos!
